q: CEO Steve Ballmer outlined their new partnership in an analysts' meeting in London today, painting a picture of Nokia as Microsoft's premiere Windows Phone partner and of Windows Phone as Nokia's core smartphone platform. Nokia will adopt Windows Phone as our primary smartphone strategy, Stephen Elop said.`` We will help drive the future of the platform, and we will bring Windows Phone to extended price points, market segments and geographies.''
